doc.after: The aircraft crashed in international waters so the Egyptian government had the right to initiate its own search and rescue and investigation Because the government did not have the resources to salvage the aircraft the Egyptian government requested that the United States lead the investigation The Egyptian government signed a letter formally ceding responsibility of investigating the accident to the United States 12
